data.title: IWIN WorldWide Inc. :: About Us
data.text:
Dr. P Krishna KumarFounder, President & CEO

An Electrical Engineer, with Masters in Management and PhD in Engineering Management. He was the Former President of IEEMA (Indian Electrical and Electronics Manufacturers' Association).

More Than FOUR Decades of Experience, in Selling, Marketing, Designing, Project Implementation, Development, Manufacturing, Strategy Developing & Financial Management. Expertise in Rehabilitating Weak Units.

Dr. Jayashree Krishna Kumar Director (Human Assets Development)

Four Masters degrees in Psychology, Psychotherapy, Statistics and Education. Also holds PhD in Stress Management and PhD in Psychology and Counselling.

More than 30 years of experience in the field, An expert in Manpower training, exclusively Cognitive Behavioural Therapy since more than two decades, Proven for employee retention and productivity Training. Has an extraordinary ability in mapping the exact situation, probably by pinpointing deficiency and initiating the corrective action by using the latest techniques and tools. Also her ability in identifying the strengths and training to utilize the same by sincerely and consistently implementing, monitoring and updating the training and achieving the desired results. She also represents various industrial bodies in manpower recruitment as a panel member in psychological assessment. Her expertise, extended humanity, skills and research oriented approach excels in this field.

Mr. CADAVASAL S KUMAR DIRECTOR (TQM & BPE)

A Post Graduate in Power Systems from IIT, Mumbai. Apart from possessing different qualifications in Quality Management from Worldâs renowned Universities, he is Certified Lead Assessor for Quality & Safety Systems of Cranefield UK, Champion / Mentor and Trained Facilitator of Taguchiâs principle of Process Management, Trainer in Sales Excellence, De Bonoâs Creativity & Innovation and Organisational Behaviour. He is also recipient of numerous Awards of Recognition in these areas.

His more than 4-Decades of experience (includes Two Decades TATA Group and Two in Wartsila) in different Industrial and Service Domains & Power Sectors both in India & Overseas in variety of responsibilities in Design Engineering, Project Management, Project Feasibility, TQM and Business Process Enhancement/Excellence Assessment is a Resource par Excellence.

Mr. AMITAVA SENGUPTA DIRECTOR (Operations & Constraint Management)

An experienced procurement, supply chain and operations professional with 30+ years of experience. Well versed in leading world class strategic operations teams & carrying out diverse high impact projects across functional domains & geographies.

Professionalism: Leading and implementing successful Mega Capital Projects in the telecom industry; Heading the Business Division for Digital Phones; Extensive experience in leading the sourcing, negotiation and management of Contracts; Strong understanding of Legal, Fiscal and commercial aspects of Operations; Thorough knowledge of Supply Chain Management processes & systems and Supply Chain activities across different geographical locations, which include a strong understanding of the Market.

Mr. N K BALAKRISHNAN DIRECTOR (Banking & Finance)

Mr. N K Balakrishnan, M Com, CAIIB and MBA has rich experience in monitoring the entire credit portfolio of a PSU Bank to the tune of about Rs. 190000 Crore as General Manager (Credit Monitoring). He has devised and successfully executed Revival & Growth Strategies for Branches as well as Regions and Zones of the Bank covering large no of Branches, He has Hands on Experience in planning and executing Turn Around Strategies for corporates and business entities as financier/member/leader of consortium of lenders and bringing about excellence in performance of the entities financed, Post Retirement, he is engaged in providing advisory services to corporates in the area of Financial Planning, Restructuring, and Transforming Business Organisations.

Mr. ASHOK KUMAR AGRAWAL DIRECTOR (PROJECTS)

Performance Driven, Professional, (Masters in Electrical Engineering) with over 38 Years of rich experience in Project Management, Manufacturing Operations, Procurement, Materials Management, Transmission business, Marketing Management, handling large Contracts in prestigious Mahanavartna Company of India. Possesses a large number of Notable Accomplishments.

Also possess a great deal of experience in handling large Government Corporations across India and Multi National corporation across the Globe.

Mr. CHEMBIL K KUMAR REGIONAL DIRECTOR (USA)

Construction professional who thinks outside the box, thrives on challenges and delivers results. 33 years experience in Project / Construction Controls, cost estimation, bid analysis, value engineering and construction management. Well versed in the review of drawings, study of project scope, quantity take offs, cost negotiations, preparation and review of material submittals, site inspections, conducting/attending meetings, Sub Contractor management, QA/QC procedures and Technical/Contractual correspondence. Possess strong leadership, management and negotiating skills.

Mr. ASHOK JAYASIMHAN REGIONAL DIRECTOR (Malaysia)

A Malaysian citizen, Graduate Engineer in Electronics and Communication with Masters of Business Administration in International Business possess more than 37 years of experience in key areas of Products, Services and business in General and specifically in-depth in Mobile and Telephony. When Technically unquestionable, he also possess excellent skills in business related areas like Business Plan, Cash Flow and P& L. He had been in accountable and Responsible positions of Multi National Giants like Ericsson and others in different locations in South East Asia. A passionate professional, with proven track records, specialist in Products and Services in the field of Communication and Electronics.

Mr. HENRY MUCHEMWA REGIONAL DIRECTOR (Zambia)

Henry holds qualifications in Business Management and Finance he is Director & CEO for Enserve Limited Group. He has been originating, executing and managing equity investments in the energy industry and as a personal private equity investor in the renewable energy sector. Prior to Enserve Limited Group in 2017, Henry was a co-founder of the FinnBILDER ZAMBIA a real estate development company, Henry has held a number of senior positions and a Board Member with various companies including companies involved in high voltage Transmission Lines and Substations EPC. He has been involved in the structuring, financing and development of renewable energy assets in Zambia and Africa.
